item.title: Main Deck Cargo Smoke Detector System Detectors – Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System (Detector of Opposite Loop Inoperative)

remarks.para: Multiple detectors within a smoke zone(s) (Forward, Mid, and/or Aft) may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: All inoperative detectors per smoke zone are of the same loop type (loop A or B), and
All detectors of opposite loop type are verified to be operative before each departure.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be dispalyed:

numlitem.para: Push and hold the flight deck FIRE/OVHT TEST button on the overhead panel.
Verify proper system indications followed by EICAS>FIRE TEST PASS message accompained by the status message associated with the inoperative smoke detection loop(s).
Release the FIRE/OVHT TEST button.

placard.para: Install Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel "MULTIPLE MAIN DECK CARGO DECK SMOKE DETECTORS IN____ (fwd, mid or aft) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.title: MAIN DECK CARGO SMOKE DETECTOR SYSTEM DETECTORS

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Verify integrity of main deck cargo smoke detection system as follows:
Close circuit breakers (MM 26-14-00/501).
Select either one of the following switches to the ENABLE position:
S2089 Ground Test Enable Switch (P461).
S2090 Remote Test Enable Switch (RCDU) at STA 400 in the left Main Equipment Center.
Set CDU to the CMC main menu and press LINE SELECT key for GROUND TEST.
When screen displays ATA name and chapter, select 26 FIRE PROTECTION SYSTEM.
Press LINE SELECT key to initiate FIRE/OVHT TEST. TEST IN PROGRESS will display for the duration of the test. Upon completion of the test, TEST PASSED or FIRE TEST FAIL will be displayed on the CDU.
If TEST PASSED is displayed, system integrity is verified.
If FIRE TEST FAIL is displayed:

note.para: FIRE TEST FAIL may appear because of a fault in a different fire/overheat detection system.

numlitem.para: Verify the following EICAS/CMC messages do not appear:

entry.para: CARGO FIRE SIGNAL> MM-A CARD FAIL
CARGO FIRE SIGNAL> MM-B CARD FAIL

numlitem.para: If the above EICAS/CMC messages appear, seek corrective action: dispatch is not allowed.
Check for the following EICAS status messages:
For each of the above EICAS status messages displayed, dispatch is allowed provided:
* The Forward zone (sub-zones 1 through 5) remain empty for above EICAS status message(s) listed and followed by one asterisk (*).
** The Mid zone (sub-zones 6 through 9) remain empty for above EICAS status message(s) listed and followed by two asterisks (**).
*** The Aft zone (sub-zones 10 through 16) remain empty for above EICAS status message(s) listed and follwed by three asterisks (***).
Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
